page.title: 05PRE-SCHOOL BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: We chose to visit{pre-school groups} when looking at education. These included Mother and Toddler groups meeting in our own school; Wester Cleddens Playgroup; Christian Centre Playgroup; Auchinairn Community Centre Playgroup; Gaelic Playgroup; Acredyke Nursery School. We were interested in the{Gaelic Group because it was only six months old. Just after our visit they won the award for the best decorated float in the Bishopbriggs Gala. Most of the children have parents who originally came from the Highlands but only 4 have mothers who speak Gaelic. The children pick up the language easily but do not use it all the time. In all the groups the children really enjoyed playing with sand, water, glue paints and messy things! They liked to dress up and play with messy toys!
